text: Helena Dahlbäck (1960-2000) was a Swedish author who wrote several children's books, for example My Sister Lotta and Me. My Sister Lotta and Me was translated into English by Rika Lessar in 1993 and published by Henry Holt & Co. (). It was illustrated by Charlotte Ramel, who also illustrated The Cake Book, published by Sprall Publishing, Sweden. In 1996, she was the Nils Holgersson Plaque laureate. title: Helena Dahlbäck
